title: How To Think About Money (To Make A Lot Of Money), with Andy Frisella - MFCEO170
itunes:title: How To Think About Money (To Make A Lot Of Money), with Andy Frisella - MFCEO170
description: Is chasing money a bad thing? I don't think so. Money is not everything in life, but it's a great, great thing.  And in this episode of the podcast, I re-emphasize how important it is to change your beliefs about money. Why?  Because you have to think right about money to make a sh*t ton of it.
